name: amysecho
description: Gesture to voice translator for Amy

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/test/db.test.js && node dist/test/recognizer.test.js && node dist/test/services.test.js && node dist/test/model.test.js && node dist/test/retrain.test.js && node dist/test/analytics.test.js && node dist/test/dialogEngine.test.js && node dist/test/seed.test.js && node dist/test/adaptiveLearning.test.js
scripts.build:android: npx eas build --platform android --profile production --project-dir app
scripts.build:ios: npx eas build --platform ios --profile production --project-dir app
